title: Sattgruen - Mitte
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Take-out, German
description: Sattgruen serves all vegan food and no longer offers dairy milk as of Jul 2013; now provides soy milk, almond milk, and hazelnut milk for coffee. Soups, hot and cold sandwiches, pasta, salads, vegan cakes, and pastries. Many organic & fair traded coffees and teas.
